alert.note: Alert for Atchison; Nodaway (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 06 at 4:54PM CDT until May 06 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN ATCHISON AND NORTHWESTERN NODAWAY COUNTIES... At 453 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Blanchard, or 9 miles northeast of Tarkio, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Golf ball size hail was reported in Westboro. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Clearmont, Elmo and Westboro. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for northwestern Missouri. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
